thread.title: Woman describes how she was tricked by fake profile

title: Woman describes how she was tricked by fake profile
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Woman describes how she was tricked by fake profile 23 January 2017 Last updated at 09:20 GMT 
The number of people defrauded in the UK by online dating scams reached a record high in 2016, the Victoria Derbyshire programme has learned. 
University professor Judith Lathlean told reporter Nicola Rees how she was tricked out of about Â£140,000 by a gang using a fake profile.
